event_not_available: Event is not available for registration
exceeds_max_per_order: Quantity exceeds maximum allowed per order ({max})
attendee_count_mismatch: Number of attendees must match the quantity
already_registered: {name} is already registered for this event
cip_required: CIP code is required for this ticket type
cannot_expire: Cannot expire a purchase order that is not pending
cannot_cancel: Cannot cancel a purchase order that is not pending
ip_limit_exceeded: You have exceeded the limit of {limit} pending orders per IP. Please complete or cancel your existing orders before creating a new one.
person_limit_exceeded: You have exceeded the limit of {limit} pending orders. Please complete or cancel your existing orders before creating a new one.
